body.name: CeraVe Hydrating Toner for Face Non-Alcoholic with Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Ceramides for Sensitive Dry Skin, Fragrance-Free Non Comedogenic, Full Size, 6.8 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
features: [HYALURONIC ACID & NIACINAMIDE TONER] pH balanced toner gently removes impurities after cleansing. With ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide the lightweight toner helps soften and smooth skin while locking in moisture for refreshed, healthy-looking skin.
[ WITHOUT ALCOHOL] The alcohol free, non-astringent, and non-drying, formula leaves skin feeling balanced, soothed, soft, and clean.

[ SENSITIVE SKIN TESTED & NON-GREASY FEEL ] Formulated with sensitive skin in mind, the hydrating and soothing formula is fragrance-free, oil-free, allergy-tested, sensitive skin-tested, and non-comedogenic so it will not clog your pores.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Toner hydrates and smooths the skin while removing any remaining makeup and impurities. The pH balanced, lightweight toner is also alcohol-free, fragrance-free, oil-free, and non-comedogenic so it will not clog your pores. The non-astringent and non-drying formula contains hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, and three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-6-II) and leaves skin feeling balanced, soothed, soft, and clean.• Paraben-free• Fragrance-free• Alcohol-free• Oil-free• Non-comedogenic• Allergy-tested• Gentle, non-irritating formula• Suitable for normal-to-dry skin, and sensitive skinKey Ingredients:• Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier• Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture• Niacinamide: Helps repair a compromised skin barrier while improving the appearance of the skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Non-Drying Lightweight Hydrating Toner Hydrates and gently removes dirt, oil, makeup, and leftover impurities after cleansing, leaving a non-drying finish & non-greasy feel. The lightweight toner softens and smoothes skin while locking in moisture for refreshed, healthy-looking skin. How to Use After cleansing skin, saturate a cotton pad or reusable cotton round. Apply to face with a cotton pad in sweeping motions. Use morning and/or evening. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Gentle & Refreshing on Skin All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. Hydrating Toner is pH balanced, formulated without alcohol, fragrance, oil & astringent and suitable for normal to dry skin including sensitive skin. Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Ceramides Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture, Niacinamide to help calm skin, and 3 Essential Ceramides to help restore & maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier.

Foaming Facial Cleanser Hydrating Facial Cleanser Hydrating Toner AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion Skin Type Normal to Oily Skin Normal to Very Dry Skin Normal to Dry Skin All Skin Types All Skin Types Benefit Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier. Foaming texture. Cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier Hydrates and cleanses excess dirt, oil, makeup, and residue after cleansing while softening and soothing skin Moisturizes throughout the day. Helps restore the skin's protective barrier. Provides broad spectrum SPF 30 protection Moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier Texture Foaming gel texture Non-Foaming, creamy texture Non-Drying, Non-Greasy, Lightweight liquid toner Smooth texture Lightweight texture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, it's definitely good if you have dry skin and a uneven skin tone. I use this product every morning and let me tell you it does its BIG ONE. It's easy to apply, I usually apply it with a basic cotton pad ( 4-5 drops). It's good for sensitive skin and it doesn't burn whatsoever. 10/10 definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toner is a good one. It's very light on the skin, it's not sticky and it gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has a clean smell. It does not over dry and you can feel the moisture in your face from it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like this toner, but don't need it.
reviews.reviewText: I like this toner it does a nice job of washing off any soap I might have left behind. But the more reading I do I find you don't really need toner. It isn't really beneficial to my skin health so I won't waste any more money on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a great value especially if you use tretinoin
reviews.reviewText: I am on tretinoin and I love this product for helping to manage peeling and dry irritated skin. This product makes a huge difference! it helps to remove peeling skin gently and helps prevent my skin from drying out and getting irritated, especially in the winter. It has been a game changer for me and has allowed me to continue using tret everyday without experiencing dryness or irritation or visibly peeling skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good purchase
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been wanting to try this toner. It’s very nice and does not dry my skin out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This toner is awesome for sensitive skin! I have noticed a tremendous improvement in my skin’s hydration and glow. So glad I listened to the great reviews and tried it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars CeraVe Hydrating Toner: A Sticky Situation I Didn't Sign Up For
reviews.reviewText: So, here's the deal—I thought CeraVe Hydrating Toner was going to be the love story of my skincare routine. Spoiler alert: It turned into a horror flick.Applying this stuff was like putting honey on my face but without the sweet aroma. More like the kind of honey that attracts ants and regret. My face felt so sticky; I started wondering if it was secretly auditioning for a role in a low-budget horror film—'The Human Fly Trap.'And let's talk about the drying sensation. Ever touched a glue stick and thought, "Hmm, I wish this could be my facial experience"? No? Well, congratulations, you've just described CeraVe Hydrating Toner. My face felt like the aftermath of a glue stick explosion at a failed DIY art class.In conclusion, if you're into skincare that makes you feel like a failed science experiment, CeraVe Hydrating Toner might be your soulmate. But if you prefer products that treat your face with a bit more respect and less stickiness, maybe swipe left on this one. It's not hydrating; it's a skincare trick played by the universe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly what you want from a hydrating toner. It makes the skin feel hydrated and excellent to apply before using something irritating like a retinol or exfoliant.
This toner is the best I’ve ever used, it’s so light. The product arrived a week ahead of time, so I was really impressed
It is very gentle snd suits my dry/sensitive skin. Perfect for removing residues post cleansing step. I love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this every morning & night id get it again
I don't need to worry about my face being to dry after cleansing when using this toner, my pores are alot smaller too!
